```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(macleish)
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

```{r}

macleish_trails <- macleish_layers %>%
  pluck("trails")
macleish_trails

macleish_elevation <- macleish_layers %>%
  pluck("contours_3m")
macleish_elevation

trail_elevations <- st_join(macleish_trails, macleish_elevation) %>%
  arrange(desc(ELEV_FT))
trail_elevations
```
